issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add lower_utf8 function in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6961](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6961). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Function signature is `utf8 lower(utf8)`. Converts an utf8 sequence to lower case.
This handles only ascii characters.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6961?focusedCommentId=16958980) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5712
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5712>
